There are two different versions of Blupi at Home: the Smaky/DOS version, and the Windows 95 version. The game can be played in English, French, and German. name: Mario 128
description: Super Mario 128 is a code name which was reused for two different infamously high-profile development projects at Nintendo in the 1990s and 2000s. Originally intended as a sequel to Super Mario 64, the sequel was canceled and the impetus was reused in a GameCube technology demonstration. As debuted at Nintendo's Space World trade show in 2000, the demonstrated graphics and physics concepts were gradually incorporated into various games through the 2000s. This includes the rapid object generation in Pikmin, the sphere walking technology used in The Legend of Zelda: Twilight Princess and Super Mario Galaxy, and the physics of Metroid Prime.

name: Velvet Dark
description:
Velvet Dark is a canceled project that was planned as a sequel or spin-off of Perfect Dark.
The game was designed as a third-person stealth action game following Velvet Dark, Joanna Dark's sister though the relation wasn't stated in Perfect Dark.
Velvet appears as the co-op character in Perfect Dark.

Likely beginning as a Nintendo 64 title, the game was canceled at some point after the GameCube was announced in 2000.
The table of contents page of a design document for the game, dated the 30th of October 2000, was revealed on twitter by Gregg Mayles in 2015.

Compatibility with the Game Boy Advance was planned, probably similar to the way content in Perfect Dark could be unlocked with a connection to the Game Boy Color game, also titled Perfect Dark.
This would also mean there were plans for a Game Boy Advance companion game of some kind, though no work on a connected title has been revealed.

name: CatRoots
description:
Developed by an unknown team under Marigul Management, a video of a game called CatRoots was displayed at E3 2000, but no details were made available.

The video shows a red, cartoon cat running from a homicidal mouse attacking it with weapons, including a hammer, ninja stars and a flamethrower. At the end of the video, the cat is pinned and defeated by the mouse's pointed tail, and a Game Over sign is shown, suggesting you played as the cat.

The game was never shown or mentioned again.

Go Heroes: Prometheus is an innovative cross-genre game based on Greek Mythology. You play as the Titan Prometheus, and through the game, you unravel the myth while activating shrines that connect the past with the present. In your journey, you will face fierce enemies and mind-bending environmental puzzles, but fear not! Valuable skills will be given to you while mighty followers accompany and assist you in your mission to Steal the Fire from the Gods!

The innovation: Action-Turn-Based

Travel through vast grid-based levels in a four-directional movement. You’ll always move first in a turn-based logic. Yet, your enemies will respond instantly to every attack, with one goal, to encircle you into tight, challenging spots, rearranging the battlefield like a rhythmic choreography.

At your disposal, a four-slot inventory to keep and swap armor and utilize abilities with the touch of a button, allowing you to focus on the action.

description: Empire Defenders is a real time strategy game with an original visual style. Armies of enemies invade your lands! Take command of large forces, slay your foes and save your realm!

name: Turbo Boom!
description: Hop into Turbo Boom! to go rally racing on obstacle courses lined with explosive obstacles. Easy to drive slow, but do you have the skills to set records? The nerves to risk everything for that extra hundredth second?

name: Fighters Kyodotai
description:
Fighters Kyodotai is a great freeware 2D fighting game from Japan. Although the game's graphics looks a bit outdated in VGA, Fighters Kyodotai shines through in the gameplay department. 
 
To begin with, there are dozens of characters to choose from, many from well-known Japanese manga/anime and video game series, including Doraemon, Dragonball Z, Pandora Crisis, and many more. Many fighters are original designs, and each fighter has plenty of unique and special attacks you can perform. The animations are excellent, and the controls intuitive. The computer players are very challenging - a lot of them will run up to you at lightning speed and perform 10+ hits combo before you can react. This may frustrate fighting game novices, although experts should welcome the chance to play a tough fanmade fighting game for once. The game is in Japanese, but it shouldn't be hard to figure out the controls If you enjoy beat'em ups, Fighters Kyodotai is a very well-made freeware old game that is well worth your time and the hefty download. Be warned of two minor weaknesses, though: the game doesn't let you change difficulty level or save key configurations. There is some nudity in the game, although it is not as nearly blatant as "Hentai" fighting games.

name: Pokémon Prism
description:
Pokémon Prism is a super customized Pokémon Crystal mod that takes place in a previously unexplored region. It contains new mechanics unseen in its inspired franchise, while refining existing gameplay.

Boasting an expansive landscape to adventure in filled with unique challenges, fresh areas to explore, and new ways to play, Pokémon Prism is an entirely new experience that gamers of all ages are sure to enjoy!

Pokémon Prism was planned to be released on December 25, 2016. It was cancelled several days prior to release, on December 21, following a cease and desist by Nintendo in which all the developer's ROM hacks were pulled offline, but later leaked onto the Internet.

name: Legbreaker
description: A puzzle platformer where you can only jump twice.

name: Chronoblast Maximum Force
description: Chronoblast Maximum Force is a fast paced bullet shooter inspired by arcade classics. Keep your finger on the trigger at all times in this challenging arcade game.

name: Minecraft: Pi Edition
description:
Minecraft: Pi Edition is a version of Minecraft developed for the Raspberry Pi. It is based on Pocket Edition Alpha v0.6.1 but slightly cut down, containing a revised feature set and support for multiple programming languages. Pi Edition is intended as an educational tool for novice programmers. Although officially discontinued, it is still available to download for free, from the official downloads page, and users are encouraged to interact with the game using an API.

Pi Edition never received any subsequent updates and is no longer updated. Despite this, it is included by default on Raspberry Pi OS (formerly Raspbian).

name: Czar: Decision
description: Czar: Decision is a mix RPG-VN game. You play the role of an inhabitant of Sriharja Kingdom named Sagara. He and his friends were revealing the mystery and the truth of the past ...

name: Champions Forces
description: Reivent yourself in a new adventure! Champions Forces will take you to the world of RPGS! Craft, Fight, Level, Upgrade! Fight the same enemies as before but with new looks! New Music! New Mechanics! Relive your Heroes Forces Experience!

name: Bernadette and the Demon Circus
description: Bernadette awoke in a hospital after a tragedy, strangely completely alone. Walking it she begins to find herself inside a circus of horrors. Only Lucce, a magical luminous rabbit can save her from this nightmare. A game about the horrors of transphobia inspired by survival horror classics.

name: Peasant Uprise
description: Peasant Uprise sets a group of peasants on a deadly quest against the new lord that has taken over their province. Unskilled in the arts of war, they will use their only known skills and tools to regain control of the Province of Swayne.

name: Duccoz - Town Sim
description:
Living life as a duck character in a fantasy town. 
 
Players will be able to interact with friendly townsfolk and explore all the areas on the map. 
 
- Team up with townsfolk to build a better town 
- Customize your own house / camp 
- Help complete missions 
- Relax in the game's many environments 
- Collect game items

name: Dungeon Slayer
description: A turn-based strategy game where you explore dark dungeons in a fantasy world filled with the monster. In your mission to save innocent people, you need to have a great sense of strategy and a little bit of imagination to slay the dark creatures!

name: Ant Detective 2
description: Kowalski is fresh out of ant rehab and ready to tackle the colony's dirty criminal underbelly. Journey with him into the twisted maze of the Anti-Royalist agenda as he solves crime with a hangover, in a classic noir setting. Was it murder? Could it be something worse?

name: Ami
description: Ami is a puzzle-platformer with a deep story. Together with the main character you get to learn the drama of this world.

name: Dawnthorn
description: Dawnthorn is a topdown, pixel-art ARPG with a character and experience firmly rooted in the 8bit era. It features action-adventure style gameplay. Players will experience hectic, item-driven real-time combat, puzzle solving, and Metroidvania-style progression across a sprawling, dungeon-filled world!

name: Asterism Online
description: Asterism Online is a Science Fiction Fantasy online multiplayer RPG set in the Groombridge 34 star system that uses a skill based advancement system with no player levels.

name: Volkhv: Memoir of the Witch Doctor
description: Discover untouched native lands and seek magical herbs and ingredients required for long-forgotten potions. Lift curses and banish evil spirits! In a Volkhv simulator, you're the one deciding to either bring aid or cause a slow, painful death.

name: First Star Down
description: First Star Down is an enigmatic journey that follows Natalie Haines as she joins a deep-space research project to determine the origins of a mysterious signal.

name: Hirt
description: Hirt is a sheep-fueled local multiplayer brawler game with intense, emergent gameplay. Hirt puts the players in the role of competing shepherds. They try to win holy pastures for their antagonized clans, fighting each other with every mean they find on the sheep inhabited islands.

name: Death of Rose
description: Death of Rose is the first instalment of a unique horror experience that introduces Beth and Scott to the chilling adventures of their mysterious teenage friendship.

name: High Treason
description: High Treason is a massively multiplayer online PvP game set in a low fantasy medieval world. Create and level up your character by completing tasks such as hunting down player targets, completing quests, and looting towns, caves, and dungeons.

name: Police Reponse VR: Disturbance
description: THE REAL DEAL EXPERIENCE OF BEING AN OFFICER OF THE LAW ARE YOU READY TO BE A UK POLICE OFFICER Set in one room following a 999/911 Disturbance Report 2+ HOURS OF RANDOMIZED AUDIO Scale The Ranks MADE BY EX COPS

name: The story of a Chinese restaurant
description: 原黑手党的龙马金盆洗手，在中华街开起中华料理店。但是经营料理店的过程中却面临着许多难题。龙马是否能够实现好不容易找到的梦想？一场料理店生存喜剧就此开始。

name: Doodle Alive
description: Puzzle game where a little doodle comes to life.

name: Dungeon Marauder
description: Dungeon Marauder is a puzzle-oriented, roguelite game where you guide a knight who can only move in a single direction at a time. Cleverly use the layout of the dangerous dungeons to your advantage while avoiding traps and enemies trying to stop you in your mighty quest!

name: Battledroid
description: Battledroid is multiplayer wargaming on a global scale, where armies of Battledroids fight for domination of the Earth! Can you construct your defences to withstand enemy attacks, build up your army of Battledroids, and advance your forces over enemy lines to claim victory for your faction?

name: Defentures
description: Defentures - defense mid-core game. Lead your dwarves, help them to reach treasures. Choose their tiers, use magic and upgrade global skills.

name: Secret Admirer
description: Newly single, you try to enjoy your first Valentine's Day alone. You have a nice evening planned, one that will make you forget all about your past life. Just you and your wine, or so you thought.

name: Xevorel: The Way Of The Feather
description: The armies of darkness are pouring in from another dimension! Explore beautifully hand-crafted locations, rediscover long-forgotten stories, and fight to save the future of civilization in Xevorel - The Way Of The Feather!

name: Murder Reservation
description: Sin descripción

name: Captain Contraband
description: In Captain Contraband, a high seas action rogue-lite, you play a ship captain trying to smuggle, trade, or pirate their way across the sea and into legend. The sea is filled with all manner of pirates and vultures waiting to feast on their next meal - and that's just the ones that are alive. The dead have become a menace of late.

name: Evolutis: Duality
description: Be prepared to be amazed by the stunning visuals and gameplay that you will experience in Evolutis. A 2D story-driven action-adventure game inspired by 80’s animes, where the player has control over 3 protagonists that have their paths intertwined across a dramatic narrative. Every situation in the game is controlled by you and depending on your decisions, the consequences will differ.

name: Final Fantasy XV Mobile
description:
A mobile MMORPG spin-off of Final Fantasy XV that will explore and add new areas.

It is planned as an alternative version of the original game starting as Noctis begins his journey, allowing them to expand on or alter parts of the story.

It is planned to release in China first, through the publisher Oriental Pearl, before being released globally.
It is being developed by JSC and GAEA.

name: Kindred Fates
description: Kindred Fates is an open world monster battling RPG, and a love letter to the monster battle genre. Our goal is to evolve the genre, and finally bring fans what they've been asking for.

name: Thief's Roulette
description: Thief's Roulette is a Story-Driven Puzzle game inspired by the Zero Escape and Danganronpa game series. Taking the narrative heavy design of visual novels and combining it with immersive, first person puzzle gameplay, Thief's Roulette hopes to be a unique gaming experience.

name: Zero Six: Behind Enemy Lines
description: "Zero Six: Behind Enemy Lines" is a Third-Person Tactical Shooter. It combines the tactical elements from a Third Person perspective with the action-packed shooting mechanics of an FPS game.

name: TwoKinds Online
description: TwoKinds Online is an MMORPG based on the webcomic Twokinds! Twokinds Online brings to life the world of the comic where you can live a fantasy life. The game focuses on community interaction, item crafting through minigames, building trade networks, and exploring the world.

name: P9: The GateAway
description: P9: The GateAway is a noir visual novel taking place in a dark world plagued by a mysterious mental disorder. As a Citizen thrust into this dark sprawl of intrigue, it is upon you to try and reveal the deepest truth of all—the meaning of existence itself.

name: Mira's Tale
description: Swing, jump and glide your way through an ancient world, uncover secrets, explore the past and solve puzzles to restore the heart of the village

name: Treis Zoes
description: This is a gothic visual novel. This is a story about the adventures of a young girl named Evanny. Will she and her friends survive in the cruel world of the dead?

name: Protagonism
description: You are the narrator of this game. Morgan is the protagonist, who knows about your existence. Narrate his life and talk to him. Make or break his life. Or something in between. Just remember things aren't always what they seem and consequences aren't always predictable.

name: Beglov Style
description: KB was just a dangerous prisoner, but then something went wrong.... The protagonist fights for survival in a post-apocalyptic world.

name: Wagrrr
description: Give your viewers more FUN and INTERACTIVITY with your broadcasts! Let your viewers respond live on-screen to your gameplay, send text and questions, and make FUN wagers on your Battle Royale Games! ADD AN EXTRA LAYER OF FUN TO YOUR BROADCASTS!

name: Sovereign's Will
description: Sovereign's Will is a turn-based ruler simulator set in the medieval period where each decision you make directly impacts the story. Separate friends from enemies. Accumulate power. Elaborate plans. Keep your eyes peeled. Make a choice.

name: Karlson
description: What do you get if you combine an FPS, Parkour, Slowmo & ... Milk? Karlson! This milk-infused fellow is on a mission to take down anyone in his way to secure the milk.

name: NeuroHex: Hacking, Spying, Sabotage
description: Sin descripción

name: Justice Strikes
description: JS (Justice Strikes) is a third-person-shooter action game.The player is a special agent in a city populated by two types of people: thugs and common people.Several thugs form a gang. The goal is to seek and defeat gangs.

name: Under the Rainbow: Prologue
description: Under the Rainbow Prologue is a short adventure game telling the story of the relationship between two best friends, Kara and Dahlia. Play as Kara Evans in a melancholy tale detailing the interactions and horrible events leading up to her best friends death.

name: Little Shop of Junk
description: Turn a bunker into a busy shop in a world where no one even remembers what the apocalypse was all about. Sell everything from canned soup to rockets, build wonders of junkyard engineering and do your best to not explode along the way!

name: Brain vs Zombies
description: Brain vs Zombies is a puzzle VR shooter that challenges you to kill each level’s zombies on a limited number of bullets. Enjoy figuring out the increasingly complex mechanisms for triggering zombie death in a world of realistic physics.

name: Fashion Designer
description: Fashion Designer is a game in which you play the role of a fashion designer. Buy sewing machines, design clothes, choose materials and sew. Control the movements of models at fashion shows and be ranked by the jury. Unlock new templates and create amazing outfits.

name: Misshapen
description: A story-driven body-horror simulator where you can’t kill your enemies but you can distort their bodies in creepy ways. Grow lumps, build weird living structures and dive into the mysteries of Zheltikov’s military base.

name: Theology
description:
Theology is a management game, in which you create your very own religion and use all means necessary to spread it through the whole wide world!

Unite the World under one God, one Religion! Create your dogmas and use them to convert as many as you can to your belief system. Watch as your enemies fall and disappear, forgotten by history. From ancient times, through middle ages, to the year 2020, do everything in your power to remain dominant and in control!

Choose the location of your religion's origin. Find your first followers and use them to spread the word of your God to neighboring cities and countries. Stay in power using your own places of worship and a holy army. Convert everyone you can to your cause, peacefully or by force. The choice is yours!

KEY FEATURES:
- Create your very own religion and define all its rules and dogmas
- Build and manage places of worship
- Create armies of devoted followers
- Wage holy wars on land, sea, and in the sky
- Watch as your religion grows from ancient times to the year 2020

name: Novalance
description: Novalance is an online top-down PvP shooter set in a futuristic universe where Mecha dominate the battlefield. Win battles to earn credits, purchase new mechs and weapon systems, and customize your loadout to match your playstyle.

name: Dynasty of the Sands
description: An Ancient Egyptian city building game. Build a paradise along the banks of the river Nile. Construct your mighty Pyramid as an everlasting monument to your Dynasty. But be careful Pharaoh, for such a feat, you'll have to manage your people, your resources and pacify the gods.

name: Perfect Harmony
description: A 4-Player retro NES Mega Man inspired game!

name: Hotel Afterlife
description: Design your own hotel in hell, expand it, purify the souls of sinners by torture and manage the hellish staff by developing a network of Afterlife corporate facilities.

name: Chaos Code: Next Episode of Xtreme Tempest
description: Sin descripción

name: Rising UpUp
description: Welcome to the world of tartan, a world full of delicious food and tartan, little people yearn for the height like everyone, strive to go up don't forget the cake and beauty along the way, these are the necessary food on the way to struggle.

name: Gravity Core
description: Gravity Core is an action based multiplayer FPS. Take the Journey through several maps with different themes, all connected by a small story.

name: Kör Comp
description: Sin descripción

name: WWE SmackDown vs. Raw Online
description: WWE SmackDown vs. Raw Online is a cancelled free-to-play professional wrestling video game previously under development by Vertigo Games that was to be published by THQ for Microsoft Windows, specifically for the Korean market.

name: Battletech: Gray Death Legion
description:
Battletech: Gray Death Legion is an unreleased mech shooter game for the Sega Mega-CD and Sega Saturn set to be published in January 1995 by Absolute Entertainment, and based on FASA's Battletech universe. The game uses a first-person perspective for the action, and is similar to Absolute's RDF: Global Conflict, also on Mega-CD. Nothing is known about the Saturn version other than being mentioned on some magazines of the time, but it's likely it would've played similarly.

The game was put on indefinite hold in late 1995 due to the poor state of Absolute's finances.

Sometime in the 2000s, a prototype of the Mega-CD version was found, which was later given a commercial unlicensed release by Good Deal Games.

name: Chao Ji Mahjong Club
description: Chao Ji Mahjong Club is an unlicensed mahjong game.

name: The Chess Lv.100
description: The Chess Lv.100 has 100 adjustable playing levels based on the engine "Crazy Bishop" with very high quality graphics!

name: Rotten Utopia
description: This is a part of the world that is undetectable by others. As a child born here, you will need to go past the darkness and terror surrounding to reach the truth.

name: Life in the Static
description: Atmospheric platform game where you have an ability to stop time.

name: CityManager
description: Are you tired of working hours and hours and not being paid enough? Welcolme to City Manager in this clicker-incremental game all your dreams will come true... reinvent yourself climb the social pyramid. Make your name stands out! Become rich! and Famous!

name: Summer Color Boi
description:
A mini game I made for the Game Maker's Toolkit game jam! 
 
Play as a little cool boi who use his glasses to manipulate blocks of color to solve puzzles. 
 
Red, yellow, green and blue. One order, one pattern! Beat the puzzles based on that!

name: Home Is Where Chip Is
description:
Feed yourself with chips. 
 
Feel like home.

name: The Pursuing Realm
description:
The Pursuing Realm is an endless side-scrolling runner game, where you find yourself in a cursed dark world.
You play as one of the last remaining Guardians of Light, while a massive fog of dark pursues you with an intimidating voice.

name: Second Earth
description:
Congratulations! You have been chosen to start a new life on Proxima Centauri B. You will construct and manage a new resource extraction outpost under the gracious supervision of the Human Mothership. Productive service guarantees citizenship! 
 
You will have to expand your economy and fortify your defences if you are to survive the huge numbers of the alien swarm. We wish you luck and productivity!

name: Project: Mara
description: Sin descripción

name: Disruption
description: Disruption is a third-person fight for the future of humanity set in the near future, quasi-dystopian world where robots, driven by the global corporate imperative for cheap and obedient labor, are displacing humans at all levels of the workforce.

name: The Elder Scrolls Online: Greymoor - Collector's Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Vertebreaker
description: A new game by the creators of Sonic Mania.

name: Half-Life 2 Classic
description: Half-Life 2 Classic is a Half-Life 1 mod that aims to recreate the entirety of Half-Life 2.

name: Rovonaut Comrade
description:
Rovonaut Comrade is a small experimental rover simulator made in 5 days for the 'Weekly Game Jam 129'

The theme was 'Lost In Space'

name: Cascade
description:
Cascade was originally developed by Epyx, and initially slated for release only in Japan for the Mega Drive. Super Fighter Team acquired full copyright to this game and released it worldwide in 2015. 
 
Cascade is a dice-based puzzler set in outer space, where your skill will be judged by wacky aliens. The best of them have invested weeks of meticulous programming into the creation of mind-boggling puzzles meant to disgrace you in front of their mutants friends. And they'll be constantly at their console, updating the code on the fly to compensete for your skill! 
 
This challenging game will amuse you with its quirky aliens that welcome you with silly spoken lines such as, Oh no, a human! and May the dice be with you. It also features a competetive two player mode. 
 
Hey! It takes cunning and quick thinking to blast through each successive level of Cascade! Complete all seven levels and you will be welcomed to the planet Cascadia. But what awaits you there: Fame? Fortune? The game's production credits? Only one way to find out...

name: Journey to the East
description: Explore a world inspired by philosophies, religions and folklore of the Far East in this 2D action-RPG.

name: 3D Gunner
description:
An unreleased space shooting game, designed for use with the Sega Master System's Light Phaser and 3D Imager accessories.

Probably an early version of what became Missile Defense 3-D. Originally described in 'Computer Entertainer' February 1987 issue.

name: Former Future
description: Former Future is a strategic top-down 2D shooter where you face an invading alien threat on the frontier world of Saturn and its neighboring moons.

name: Dawn of Misgiving
description: Sin descripción

name: Sierra Ops: Episode 4 - Cadence of the Morning Star
description:
Sierra Ops Episode 4: Cadence of the Morning Star is the final part of a four-part series where both decisions made and performance in combat change the power balance of the two armed forces.
Is it even possible to end this war without losing everything?

With the released of episode 4, “New Game +” mode will be unlocked and playable with any save that has reached any one of the normal endings of the game.
...Will this time be different? One can only wonder.

name: Sierra Ops: Episode 3 - Unending Dusk
description: Sierra Ops Episode 3: Unending Dusk is part three of a four-part series where both decisions made and performance in combat change the power balance of the two armed forces. Is it even possible to end this war without losing everything?

name: Six Sided Sanctuary
description: Six Sided Sanctuary is a puzzle game where you attach panels with special properties to the sides of a cube. Depending on the orientation of the panels they can help you reach your goal. Fly, flop, and find your way through 25+ unique levels in three unique themes

name: NHL 20: Ultimate Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: NHL 20: Deluxe Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Infinity Wars 2
description: A Simultaneous turn-based strategy card game, honoring the original Infinity Wars, with refurbished systems and a stronger codebase, for the best possible Infinity Wars Experience.

name: Golden Nugget Casino DS
description: Sin descripción

name: Medium Rare
description: Co-op and competitive party game where you and your friends battle as cute (but deadly) dragons in the playful fantasy-themed world of Medium Rare!

name: Your little story: Valentine's Day
description: Love is such a silly feeling. Can you really live for it? Why would you die for it? Empty words... But what if someone's life can really depend on your love?

name: Adventure Trip
description: Adventure Trip is an interesting game, it allows you unlimited possibilities, in different ways to pass. Seek rules from the game and find different ways to be different from others. The meaning of life is different. Find fun and share it with others. Hope you can find your own fun in the game。

name: Shake Your Body
description: This is a virtual reality game with rhythm music. There are two modes to choose from: challenge mode and appreciation mode.

name: Butterfly Killer
description: Sin descripción

name: Kickochet
description: Kickochet is a tough-as-nails-lite™ action game where you skillfully kick and ricochet your only shuriken off walls, around puzzles, and through robot faces. Race the clock, rescue your ninja cat, and destroy Robo Corp before their cat memes take over the world!

name: Great Witcher
description: Sin descripción

name: Jimmu
description: Jimmu is a challenging Japanese horror-themed boss hunting game that takes place in Japan centuries ago. The game features a non-linear open-world with some RPG elements.

name: Hooligan Simulator
description: Become a hooligan, get respect in your neighborhood and try any unethical ways can get you rich quick & fast.

name: Shardhunters
description: A tactical, turn-based skirmish game where two players fight intense battles for control over powerful gemstones. Shardhunters puts your team building and tactical senses to the test while offering multiple win conditions.

name: Triuna: The Seven
description: Set between two realities, Arthur must brace his everyday life in the modern world, whilst adoring more and more for his different life in the fantasy world of Triuna... and save it from a power hungry mortal.

name: Sea of Leaves
description: A young girl escapes from her hometown, leaving friends and family. After many years, she returns to her place. Why does she come back? What was behind her escape? Leaves is a contemplative game where the environment plays a key role to explore main character's thoughts, memories and sensations.

name: The Gladhollow Nasties
description: A beast stalks the forest by night. It will take cunning, stealth, and strategy to survive long enough to untangle a nonlinear mystery through one wooded village and many despicable generations. Play through the eyes of the sinful, pernicious, malicious morsels themselves: The Gladhollow Nasties.

name: Epifrog
description: Use your hero, units and structures to survive incoming waves of enemies! Travel far into the land to gather rare resources and powerful artifacts. Beware of mighty bosses like Coffe-beak or Werebuff!

name: Chip: Rescuer of Kittens
description: Metroidvania in retro-style about a space rescuer of kittens. Travel from planet to planet, shoot to evil robots and save stolen kittens!

name: Code Lyoko : Carthage Explorer
description: Sin descripción

name: Love Me Forever
description: Love Me Forever is a Puzzle, Exploration RPG with dark humor and profanity. You slip into the role of a young firefighter, that saves the life of an excessive, clingy girl. Following up in a cute, insane relationship together that will last forever... according to her.

name: Hyena: Dogs of War
description: Can you free Banana-land with just your trusty jeep against the Republic's forces? Join team H.Y.E.N.A., to save prisoners of war from the treacherous Dictator of the Banana Republic.

name: Kingdom of Keogth: the Arena
description: Control a squad of adventurers, dropped into an arena with other squads. All have the same goal: to be the last one standing. Train and equip your soldiers. Build a solid strategy and defeat all of your opponents. Fight to become the King's regular company.

name: Cold War Minister
description: Become the leader of the USSR consumed by the vision of establishing a world-class superpower. Wage the Cold War brutally and without compromise, or through cunning politics and effective propaganda.

name: Nocturnous
description: Fight your way through hostile lands as you search for the soul of a once powerful king and destroy it.

name: Ruinic
description: Ruinic is a massive multiplayer adventure, with monsters to kill, quests to complete, and treasure to win. You control your own character who will improve and become more powerful the more you play. This isn't a game where everything that happens is pre-determined. What you do in the world is up to you!

name: Fist of the Forgotten
description: Jump, punch, and slide through the remnants of civilizations using forgotten artifacts to augment your movement and combat abilities on a journey to find the last human holdouts where your brother might be.

name: The Mechanical World of Dr. Gearbox
description: Unravel the forgotten mysteries of an elderly adventurer by retracing his steps across four distinct environments. Overcome the odds by recruiting a deep roster of eccentric and fascinating creatures to aid you on your quest to discover the truth.

name: VR Fantasy Island
description: This is an early stage for the game VR Fantasy Island. We are trying out a concept to see if people would be interested in playing a game like this in VR.

name: I have lived
description: Welcome to the end of an unnamed world. Its last wishes have materialized as two entities. Become a part of their journey and give the world another chance by recollecting the world's remaining Essences.

name: Free Agency
description: Life simulation game but you gotta keep them too busy to become self-aware.

name: Magnet Fishing Simulator
description: Are you bored of traditional fishing? Put your rod away and search in outdoor waters for ferromagnetic objects available to pull with a strong neodymium magnet. Find rare and valuable items, restore them, and sell!

name: Stellar Wars
description: The futuristic successor to the award wining Legendary Wars series!

name: O.M.S
description: O.M.S is a casual story-driven 2D Sci-Fi Platformer where you control LIO as his world is threatened by SIMPHONY the very AI that powers his planet. LIO will be avoiding dangerous obstacles and enemies as he hopes to repair SIMPHONY and save his world.

name: My Work Is Not Yet Done
description:
'My Work Is Not Yet Done' is a pilgrimage simulator following the final days of the inquisitor Avery, the last remaining survivor of the Empire’s doomed excursionary efforts into the remote and unaccountable Reach. Tasked with tracking down the source of an inscrutable signal, she must navigate, survey and survive an eerie, ever-shifting landscape reclaimed by nature — and perhaps something stranger.

'My Work Is Not Yet Done' seeks to provide a unique and innovative take on the survival genre aimed at accurately reproducing the physical and psychological experience of being alone and lost in the wilderness, resituating the player’s role within nature as an interloper rather than conquistador. The game is set in an expansive open world environment that eschews the genre tropes of cold weather survival for a dense, oppressively rainy and humid forest, seamlessly blending procedural generation with a variety of handcrafted locations to ensure a sense of constant disorientation even across repeat playthroughs.

name: Fairtravel Battle
description: Fairtravel Battle is a fantasy collectible card game experience with no additional purchases or microtransactions.

name: Trials in Tainted Space
description: Trials in Tainted Space is an adult, erotic, ultimately customizable, textual adventure game under active development by Fenoxo & crew.

name: Tremors: The Game
description: Cancelled game by Rock Solid Studios in the Tremors universe. Originally scheduled on PC, PS2, Xbox and GameCube for the fall of 2003, it was however cancelled by the summer.

name: Silent Escape: Induction
description: Silent Escape: Induction is a first-person shooter, re imagined version of the original Silent Escape, released in 2012. The story starts during the events of Half-Life 2. You play as on of the rebels named Shawn participation in “Silent Escape”, a plan aimed to save people from the horrors of war and send them to a safe place. But, no matter for scientific accuracy in the making of the plan, things don’t go so well...

name: Blood II: Revelations
description: Blood II: Revelations was a planned expansion pack for Blood II: The Chosen which was under development by Tequila Software, a British based software developer which consisted of Peter Hopkins, Tom Francis, and David Wilson.

name: Wild Life

Roam the world from fertile forests to dry and sun-soaked deserts, spread your wings and cut through the skies of a world torn by greed and vanity. Find your own way to ensure your survival and embrace the possibilities of fighting and sex.

name: Lair Defense: Dungeon
description:
ay back in ancient history, when humans and dragons live in peace, the human emperor once heard eating dragon eggs will make one live forever. Since then, the war between humans and dragons has begun. You are the ONE to stop the greedy humans from stealing eggs and killing dragons. 
 
Dragons/Spells: 
- Fire Dragon: Defends against invading enemies with fiery power. It is one of the most powerful and ancient creatures. 
- Ice Dragon: A heroic defender specializes in ice attack. It can freeze invading enemies. 
- Poison Dragon: Defends against invading enemies with poisonous power. Getting too near to it is horribly dangerous. 
- You can raise dragon from young to adult and giant. Many special skills are only available for adult/giant dragon. 
- Fire rain: special spell that damage an area by fire rain. 
- Ice up: A spell that temporarily freeze all enemies. 
 
Enemies: 
- Varying from armless peasants to druids, the masters of magic power. 
- Thieves move fast and become invisible as they like; 
- Mage is immune to fire dragon attacks. 
- Priest is the master of healing and prevervation. They can heal themselves quickly. 
- ... 
- And many more enemies are joining battle as level goes. 
 
Command your dragons to stop greedy humans from stealing eggs now, HERO!

The #1 FREE Android bubble game

- Stunning and fascinating new maps: Zen Cove, Mirage Castle, Tranquil Pond, Spooky Pinnacles 
- Lots of interesting props including Color Bubble, Aiming Line, Fire Bubble, Shield etc.

description: Austria suffered a major defeat at the hands of Napoleon in 1805. This led to the dissolution of the Holy Roman Empire. In 1809 Austria sought revenge for this insult. The French and their allies proved they were up to the challenge and sent the Austrians packing. Now Napoleon is on the offensive and is racing towards Vienna. Take up your Marshall's baton as the French. Attempt to destroy the Austrian army before it can unite. Or as Archduke Charles, defeat Napoleon's forces on the legendary Marchfeld.

name: Campaign Eckmuhl
description: In 1809 the Austrian rulers sought revenge for their defeat by Napoleon in 1805. Led by the capable Archduke Charles, they invaded Barvaria in an attempt to destroy the scattered Army of Germany. Can Napoleon arrive in time to unite his men or will his army be defeated in detail?

name: Battles of North Africa 1941
description:
The campaign in North Africa was the primary focus of both Italy and the British Empire in the first half of World War Two. Mussolini believed this was to be the opportunity to prove the Italian value to the Axis alliance. For the British, it was the first time that they began to make progress on land after the ignominious withdrawal from France. Coupled with the strategic victory in the air during the Battle of Britain, the success in Operation Compass in December 1940 strengthened morale across the British Commonwealth. 
 
Both sides had significant constraints; the British were recovering from their strategic defeat in France, the Italians were struggling to support the war effort with an underdeveloped economy while the Germans were focused on the launching of the invasion of Russia (Unternehmen Barbarossa) in June 1941. 
 
The desert though was to be the ultimate victor. The logistical requirements to support an army in extended operations was to prove beyond the ability of either side and the 1941 engagements were to be marked by theater wide advances and retreats multiple times. 
 
This third release in the Panzer Battles franchise is focused on many of the large and small battles that occurred in eastern Libya and western Egypt as well as Greece. It is a departure from the more static battles of the earlier titles and maneuver engagements are much more prevalent.

name: Salaam
description:
Salaam is a high tension runner game that puts a player in the shoes of a refugee forced to flee a war torn region. 
 
The game starts with a caravan of refugees walking through the jungle on their way to safety. The setting is peaceful, yet dire, given the circumstances. Parents carrying their children struggle to keep pace with the rest of the group. Your character fades into view. Suddenly, gunshots are fired in the distance! Your family crouches to avoid danger. There is brief pause and silence. More shots are fired and the caravan begins to run. Panic ensues and eventually your character makes way to the front of the group. A military vehicle appears ahead and soldiers fire in your direction. Now alone, your character turns down the nearest path. Thus, the game begins.

description: Do you know this? A vegan hippy coming up to you to tell you what to eat and what not? Even worse, all their veggies got mutated! It's time to defend your grill and show those evil veggies what you are made of - strong manly meat. ALL HAIL THE BACON!

name: Co-Jump, Fly
description: Sin descripción

name: Monsters sandbox
description: Multiplayer game with the ability to connect via LAN or Internet. Fight monsters alone or with friends. Find weapons and ammunition during the game or buy them in the store. Different game modes.

name: Drunk Santa Simulator
description: Drunk Santa Simulator is the simulator you have been waiting for since your first xmas. Become Santa, a raging alcoholic with anger management issues. Discover how shitty Santa's job is, how annoying all those letters and the bloody elves really are.

name: BOC
description: BOC: Birth Of Civilization, is a historical turn-based 4X strategy game, which includes features like 360º realistic worlds on a global scale, hardcore tactical components, and climate simulation. Our approach will take players all the way from the Ice Age (55.000 B.C) up until the fall of the Western Roman Empire.

name: Castle in the Darkness II
description: Sin descripción

name: Guns and Braps
description: Fight for survival and supremacy in an unforgiving and lawless landscape. Scour your surroundings for weapons, ammunition, base supplies and vehicles. Build a base, grow and fortify it, amass a vast arsenal of weapons and dominate invading players. Raid other player's bases with your spoils of war and grow your empire.

name: The Area 51 Secret: Boombox Killer
description: Ted & Herber are chilling on the sofa doing homework when the door ring... it's a secret agent from the Area 51 warning the neighborhood about an alien killer that escaped the base during the 20th September raid.. Will they be safe? Will they discover the secrets of Area 51?... It's all up to you in this interactive story!

name: Food Factory VR
description: Food Factory VR is an exciting casual game with foods theme. Easy to play and operate, there is a feature that anyone can enjoy easy and fun. Let's compete with users around the world in various stages that require player competition.

name: Cyborg Mechanic
description: Become a cyborg surgeon mechanic in shady and absurd cyberpunk underworld. Diagnose your clients, cut off limbs and remove organs, upgrade bodies and brains. Attach fancy augmentations during complex procedures. Expand your skills and your workshop.

name: Space Climber
description: Two space exterminators prepared to clean the galaxy from vermin. Collect ammo for your rifle and oxygen tanks. Old school game, funny, difficult and addictive. Compatible with keyboard and controller. 1 or 2 players (Remote Play Together). Demo available.

name: Rats for Breakfast
description: Repair enchanted machinery with anything at hand, and face whatever unknown terrors lurk below, in this bizarre post-apocalyptic fantasy horror game from the developer of DUSK, Fingerbones, and The Moon Sliver.

name: Heroes Forces
description: Heroes Forces is a small adventure with strong RPG elements such as Crafting, Talents, Leveling, Dungeoning, Class changes and a Market.

name: Cyber.one: Trans Car Racing
description: Feel this fascinating experience of driving a car at hyper speed in a cybernetic, physically functioning world. Instead of doing laps on a loop, survive into the raw world in the quickest time. Cyber racing sci-fi. - racing action.
